content: measurements width at top approx 170 cm / 66-7/8 length at center back approx 95 cm / 37-3/8 materials drops alpaca 200 gr nr 7120 light seafoam and use drops vivaldi 100 gr nr 18 mint vivaldi is now discontinued see alternative yarn drops brushed alpaca silk 1 drops 5 mm / us h crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 4 treble_crochet us / dtr uk + 4 chain in width with 1 strand of each yarn 2 strands = approx 2 3/8 / 6 cm accessories approx 2 6 meters / 2-7/8 ys ribbon 1 cm / 1/2 in wide in matching color 1 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/garnstudio-drops-brushed-alpaca-silk
